pullRequest.body:
This allows us to generalize an instance which stated this for `Fin n`. 

We also generalize `StrictMono.range_inj` for maps into preorders.

---

Just FYI thsi works
```suggestion
    cases (hg.injective hc).not_lt this
```
Maybe not useful, but the condition is also true under `[LinearOrder Î±] [WellFoundedLT Î²] [Preorder Î²]`, right? Can you either prove that or add a comment explaining why you didn't prove it?

This can be proved by transferring the `WellFoundedLT` instance to `Î±` using [`RelEmbedding.isWellFounded`](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Order/RelIso/Basic.html#RelEmbedding.isWellFounded). I'll add a comment explaining that (since having four nearly duplicate instances is probably not a good thing).

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Order/InitialSeg): Subsingleton (Î± â‰ƒo Î²) on well-orders
